overview: Daucus Buganvilia is a collection of natural elements in direct contact with the film. Lichen, sylvan plants, dried petals, found leaves, meet the photochemical support through an experimentation of cinema without camera which discovers the minute constitution of the matter. A rhythmic visual study where plant motifs, textures and sensations follow one another, revealing nature in its most imperceptible details.
title: Daucus Buganvilia
